sentences.en: 'Tell monsieur what kind of shoe it is, and the maker's name.'
sentences.cn: “ 告诉这位先生这是什么鞋, 是谁做的. ”

sentences.en: A cabinet maker must be a master craftsman.
sentences.cn: 家具木工必须是技艺高超的手艺人.
日本一家主要的计算机生产商

sentences.en: Bresson is par excellence the Catholic film-maker.
sentences.cn: 布雷森是个非常出色的天主教电影制作人。

sentences.en: He is a trouble maker . You must be distant with him.
sentences.cn: 他是个捣蛋鬼, 你不要跟他在一起.

sentences.en: He was bound ( as an ) apprentice to a shoe - maker.
sentences.cn: 他 立约 给鞋匠当学徒.

sentences.en: It has been said that art is a tryst , for in the joy of it maker and beholder meet.
sentences.cn: 有人说艺术是一种幽会, 因为艺术家和欣赏者可在幽会的乐趣中相遇在一起.

sentences.en: It seems he is a tool-and-die maker.
My son is an apprentice in a furniture maker's workshop.
sentences.cn: 我的儿子在一家家具厂做学徒.

sentences.en: No , I was not a shoe - maker by trade . I -- I learn't it here.
sentences.cn: 不是. 我 -- 我是在这儿才学做鞋的.

sentences.en: Not for nothing was the plane called "The widow-maker"
sentences.cn: 这种飞机被称作“寡妇机”是事出有因的。

sentences.en: See if you can handle this young trouble - maker once and for all.
sentences.cn: 看看你能不能把那个小捣乱分子一劳永逸的打发走.

sentences.en: Simon Lane quickly found his niche as a busy freelance model maker.
sentences.cn: 西蒙·莱恩很快找到了适合自己的位置，成了一名忙碌的模型制作的自由职业者。

sentences.en: The car was out of control. There was nothing I could do except prepare to meet my maker!
sentences.cn: 汽车失控了, 我完全无能为力,只能准备去见上帝!

sentences.en: The famed film-maker slammed the claims as "an outrageous lie"
sentences.cn: 这位大名鼎鼎的电影制片人声色俱厉地抨击了这些说法，称之为“无耻的谎言”。

sentences.en: The maker guarantees this hair dye to stay on three weeks.
sentences.cn: 制造商保证染发剂使用后的有效期间为三星期.

words.tran_cn: 做，使，安排（make的过去式和过去分词）
使得；进行；布置，准备，整理；制造；认为；获得；形成；安排；引起；构成

phrases.tran_cn: n. 电影导演；电影制作人
制冰机，制冰器；制冰装置
准备买卖未上市股票的经纪人；[经]从事欧洲债券二级市场交易的银行

trans.tran_cn: 制造者，制造商，[法] 签署本票的一方，上帝，〈古〉诗人
trans.tran_en: a person or company that makes a particular type of goods
